title: Sri Lankans have the right to protest peacefully: US Ambassador
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Newly appointed US Ambassador to Sri Lanka Julie Chung emphasized that Sri Lankans have the right to protest peacefully.
She pointed out that it was essential for democratic expression.
In a tweet, she stated that she was closely monitoring the situation.
Sri Lankans have the right to protest peacefully: US Ambassador
First major food aid of 40,000T rice to Sri Lanka from Delhi
Anuradhapura bus drivers haphazardly park in protest of fuel crisis
